function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Ineffective mitigation strategies may lead to overwhelming the healthcare system capacity","Impact":"Exceeding surge limits for general ward and ICU beds, potential for 250,000 deaths in the UK and 1.1-1.2 million in the US","Mitigation":"Implement effective epidemic suppression strategies","Technologies":"Healthcare capacity management systems, emergency surge capacity planning","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, general population","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government authorities"},{"Description":"Social and economic effects of epidemic suppression measures will be profound","Impact":"Disruption of society and economy","Mitigation":"Implementation of support systems for affected individuals and businesses, economic stimulus packages","Technologies":"Social support systems, economic relief programs","People":"General population, businesses, workers","Owner":"Government authorities, support organizations"},{"Description":"Uncertainty of long-term success of epidemic suppression strategy","Impact":"Potential for long-term failure of suppression strategy","Mitigation":"Continuous monitoring and adaptation of suppression measures, research for new intervention methods","Technologies":"Data analytics for monitoring, research and development of new intervention methods","People":"Policymakers, researchers, epidemiologists","Owner":"Government authorities, research institutions"}]}
